UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Antimicrobial activity and bacterial-membrane interaction of ovine-derived cathelicidins.
Literature.Author: Anderson RC, Hancock RE, Yu PL

Literature.Title: Synergistic effects of ovine-derived cathelicidins and other antimicrobials against Escherichia coli O157:H7 and Staphylococcus aureus 1056 MRSA.
Literature.Author: van der Linden DS, Short D, Dittmann A, Yu PL

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli O111(MIC=2µg/ml),Escherichia coli UB1005(MIC=0.125µg/ml),Escherichia coli DC2(MIC=0.125µg/ml),Escherichia coli O157:H7(MIC=8µg/ml),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium ATCC 14028s(MIC=0.5µg/ml),Salmonella enterica serovar Typhimurium MS4252S(MIC=0.125µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAO1(MIC=4µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa Z61(MIC=8µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus NCTC 4163(MIC=32µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus R147(MIC=64µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus 1056(MIC=16µg/ml),Staphylococcus epidermidis(MIC=16µg/ml),Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 29212(MIC=32µg/ml),Candida albicans 105(MIC=32µg/ml),Candida albicans 3153A(MIC=16µg/ml),Escherichia coli O157:H7(MIC=16.3µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus 1056(MIC=26µg/ml)
